  • “Our current estimates are that there are approximately 80 proprietary file formats for optical microscopy alone (and not including other common imaging techniques) that must be supported by any bioimage informatics tool that aims to provide a generalizable solution. In short, the lack of standardized access to data makes the generation of informatics tools quite difficult.” http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2789254/
